attributes.action: Stop illegal migrants entering our country especially on the South East Coast
attributes.additional_details: We want the illegal immigrants that have came here in there boats to all be sent back to there own country it’s putting a strain on our economy. That’s the reason we voted brexit something needs doing because over 500 people have came here illegally since we have been in lockdown on the South East Coast
attributes.background: We want to stop illegal immigration and stop migrants from entering our country there is to many people here already and that’s the reason we voted for brexit. They are entering our country on the South East Coast over 500 people since we have been in lockdown this needs sorting.
